code: import React from'react';import{Box,List,ListItem,ListItemIcon,ListItemText,Typography}from'@mui/material';import{useNavigate,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import HomeIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Home';import PeopleIcon from'@mui/icons-material/People';import GradeIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Grade';import SettingsIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Settings';import LogoutIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Logout';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const menuItems=[{text:'Trang chủ',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomeIcon,{}),path:'/dashboard'},{text:'Danh sách sinh viên',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PeopleIcon,{}),path:'/students'},{text:'Nhập điểm',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GradeIcon,{}),path:'/grades'},{text:'Cài đặt',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SettingsIcon,{}),path:'/settings'}];const Sidebar=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{width:240,minHeight:'100vh',bgcolor:'#1a2f4d',color:'white',position:'fixed',left:0,top:0},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{p:2},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",component:"div",children:"Qu\u1EA3n l\xFD \u0111i\u1EC3m"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(List,{children:[menuItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListItem,{button:true,onClick:()=>navigate(item.path),sx:{bgcolor:location.pathname===item.path?'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08)':'transparent','&:hover':{bgcolor:'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12)'}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemIcon,{sx:{color:'white'},children:item.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:item.text})]},item.text)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListItem,{button:true,onClick:()=>navigate('/'),sx:{mt:'auto','&:hover':{bgcolor:'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12)'}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemIcon,{sx:{color:'#ff4444'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LogoutIcon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:"\u0110\u0103ng xu\u1EA5t",sx:{color:'#ff4444'}})]})]})]});};export default Sidebar;
